name: tscb
description: CLI that adds batteries to the TypeScript compiler.
author: smack0007 <zachary.snow@gmail.com>

scripts.release: npm run build && shx cp package.json ./bin && npm publish bin && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release-patch: npm version patch && npm run release
scripts.release-minor: npm version minor && npm run release
scripts.release-major: npm version major && npm run release
